mapper.select:
select
from enrol_class where subject_id = #{subjectId} and status = 1 and start_date > now() ORDER BY start_date;

SELECT cla.id AS classId, cla.`name` AS className, cla.teach_mode_code AS teachModeCode, cla.teach_mode_name AS teachModeName, cla.periods AS periods, cla.subject_id AS subjectId, sub.`name` AS subjectName, cla.class_type_code AS classTypeCode, cla.class_type_name AS classTypeName, goods.price AS discountPrice, cla.start_date AS startDate, cla.class_time AS classTime, cla.plan AS planStudent, cla.current AS currentStudent, cam.id AS campusId, cam.`name` AS campusName, cam.address AS address, cam.introduce AS introduce, cam.serial_code AS campusCode, goods.is_free AS isFree, goods.is_other_expense AS isOtherExpense, goods.other_expense AS otherExpense, goods.other_expense_remark AS otherExpenseRemark FROM enrol_class cla LEFT JOIN enrol_campus cam ON cla.campus_id=cam.id LEFT JOIN enrol_subject sub ON cla.subject_id=sub.id LEFT JOIN enrol_goods_class gc ON cla.id=gc.class_id LEFT JOIN enrol_goods goods ON goods.id=gc.goods_id WHERE cla.id=#{classId} AND goods.id=#{goodsId};

SELECT cla.id AS classId, cla.`name` AS className, goods.price AS price, cla.start_date AS startDate, cla.class_time AS classTime, cam.address AS address, cam.id AS campusId, cla.subject_id AS subjectId, cla.class_type_code AS classTypeCode, cla.teach_mode_code AS teachModeCode, cla.current, cla.plan, goods.is_free AS isFree, goods.is_other_expense AS isOtherExpense, goods.other_expense AS otherExpense, goods.other_expense_remark AS otherExpenseRemark FROM enrol_class cla,enrol_goods_class gc,enrol_goods goods,enrol_campus cam
WHERE cla.campus_id=#{campusId} AND gc.goods_id=#{goodsId} AND gc.goods_id=goods.id AND gc.class_id=cla.id AND cla.campus_id=cam.id

SELECT ec.id as classId,ec.class_type_code as classTypeCode, ec.`name` as className FROM enrol_class ec WHERE ec.status=1 AND FIND_IN_SET(ec.campus_id,#{campusIds})
AND FIND_IN_SET(ec.subject_id,#{subjectId})
AND FIND_IN_SET(ec.class_type_code,#{classTypeCode})
AND FIND_IN_SET(ec.teach_mode_code,#{teachModeCode})
